page.title: 02Employment 1
page.content: The majority of people living in the {private housing estates}at{Pine Hills and{Galley Hill}on the outskirts of Guisborough commute to{Teesside}for employment.{I.C.I. PLC}still remains the biggest single employer locally at it's{Agricultural Division,Billingham and it's{Petrochemical Division, {Wilton. Despite the closure of some departments during the{recession,}the {British Steel Corporations's Teesside {Works}is the second biggest single employer locally and still the largest steel complex on{one site}in Britain.A significant number of teachers and lecturers employed by the{Cleveland {Education Authority}also reside in the area.
